title: Investigate an Employee Misconduct Claim
description: An employee files a formal complaint alleging harassment by a coworker. An HR business partner must investigate.

tasks.description: Document the initial complaint from the employee in the case management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: HRBP creates a new investigation case with all the initial details.

tasks.description: Schedule and conduct confidential interviews with the complainant, the accused, and any witnesses.
tasks.expected_outcome: HRBP conducts and documents all interviews.

tasks.description: Review relevant evidence (e.g., emails, chat logs) and make a recommendation based on the findings.
tasks.expected_outcome: After a thorough review, the HRBP concludes the claim is substantiated and recommends disciplinary action.
